metadata.title: CVE-2018-17141 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: HylaFAX 6.0.6 and HylaFAX+ 5.6.0 allow remote attackers to executearbitrary code via a dial-in session that provides a FAX page with the JPEGbit enabled, which is mishandled in FaxModem::writeECMData() in thefaxd/CopyQuality.c++ file.

criterions.comment: hylafax: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
